Entries.default: "Vela, that's... not a very nice word. Who taught you that?"
She stands on her tippy toes and whispers in Aloth's ear.
"I see. We'll just have to have a little chat, won't we?"
"Collywocks, someone's learnin' the lass right!"
"There are much better examples to follow for proper language."
"Is anyone seeing to your schooling, Vela?"
"I'm learning lots! Which side of the boat is good for fishing, which side is good for puking after too much ale..."
"I'm learning lots! Which side of the boat is good for fishing, which side is good for puking when Uncle Engrim's had too much ale..."
"I'm learning lots! Which side of the boat is good for fishing, which side is good for puking when Uncle Serafen's had too much ale..."
"Uncle Serafen."
"That settles it. You and I will start with mathematics, history, rhetoric..."
"What about fighting?"
"My dear, there is no weapon sharper than a well-trained mind!"
"Hey, Vela, I put on my boots the other day to find out they were full of crabs and sea water. You wouldn't know anything about that?"
"Can I pet the birdie?"
"Vela, do you have any duties onboard this ship?"
"This be important lass, so listen close - whatever you be owing the Watcher, you don't owe your life."
"Teku, do you get hungry when you're a shark?"
"Don't let anyone tell you you're too shrimpy to be a fighter. I was half your age when I started training."
"No, but I'll keep my eyes out. I hear some of the crew whispering bad things about you."
"Atta girl. Divert suspicion, give 'em a new scapegoat. Rehearse your story so you can say it without hesitating."
"I knew we were right to steal you from your home as a baby."
"Why would I want to leave? I like it here."
"What's a bilge-swallow?"
"That's 'what be a bilge-swallow,' little lass, and it be a swabby fathom-headed 'nough to drink from the bilge."
"You talk funny, Uncle Serafen."
"You know, lass, each time you call me that, you be aging me three halfs a year."
"You ever be wanting to leave, you just pack right up and ship out."
"Just saying, lass. He don't own you."
Entries.female: "Just saying, lass. She don't own you."

Entries.default: "Nobody does."
"One more time, Vela - who be the High Queen Sea-Devil of the Deadfire?"
"Malnaj!"
"Aye, that she be, lass. That she be."
"Of course you may. Ishi, if you even think of pecking the young lady..."
"His wings are so soft!"
"Just be careful, honey. You wouldn't be the first orlan he's tried to carry off."
"I get very hungry, dear one. Hard work speeds up the appetite."
"But not little orlans!"
"Child, when I am a shark it means that you are the safest little orlan in the Deadfire."
"Yes I help scrub the deck and mend the sails and pour the grog and... all sorts of things."
"Hmm. I wonder if you are small enough to fit down the bore of an Imperial long gun..."
"I don't know. Why?"
"Well, someone has to clean them."
